mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_location WHERE parent_code IN #{id} ORDER BY code ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_location(code, parent_code, name, location_level, end_level_flag, is_disabled, ctime, cemp_name, ts01) VALUES (#{code}, #{parentCode}, #{name}, #{locationLevel}, #{endLevelFlag}, #{isDisabled}, #{ctime}, #{cempName}, #{ts01})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_location SET code = #{code}, parent_code = #{parentCode}, name = #{name}, location_level = #{locationLevel}, end_level_flag = #{endLevelFlag}, is_disabled = #{isDisabled}, utime = #{utime}, uemp_name = #{uempName}, ts01 = #{new_ts01} WHERE id = #{id} and ts01= #{ts01}
